statements: SELECT * FROM team_roster;
SELECT player_name, jersey_number FROM team_roster ORDER BY jersey_number DESC;
SELECT player_name, position FROM team_roster WHERE jersey_number > 10;
SELECT player_name FROM team_roster WHERE position='Forward';
SELECT player_name, position FROM team_roster WHERE jersey_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, jersey_number, position FROM team_roster WHERE jersey_number > 10 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, position FROM team_roster WHERE position = 'Forward' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, jersey_number FROM team_roster WHERE position = 'Defender' AND jersey_number < 20 ORDER BY jersey_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_roster WHERE player_name LIKE '%son%' OR player_name LIKE '%man%' ORDER BY jersey_number ASC;
SELECT player_name, jersey_number, position FROM team_roster WHERE jersey_number BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY position, player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM TeamRoster ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, position FROM SquadList WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, position FROM SquadList ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster, SquadList WHERE TeamRoster.team_id = SquadList.team_id;
SELECT team_id, team_name, coach_name FROM TeamRoster
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_id = 1
SELECT player_name, position FROM SquadList WHERE team_id = 2
SELECT team_id, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM SquadList GROUP BY team_id
SELECT team_name, coach_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM TeamRoster JOIN SquadList ON TeamRoster.team_id = SquadList.team_id GROUP BY team_name
SELECT * FROM Player WHERE player_position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM Player WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT player_name, player_position, player_age FROM Player ORDER BY player_age DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM Player WHERE player_age > 25;
SELECT TeamRoster.team_name, TeamRoster.team_captain, Player.player_position FROM TeamRoster INNER JOIN Player ON TeamRoster.team_id = Player.team_id WHERE Player.player_position = 'Midfielder';
SELECT * FROM Player WHERE player_position = 'Midfielder';
SELECT player_name, player_age FROM Player WHERE player_age > 25;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(player_id) AS num_players FROM TeamRoster JOIN Player ON TeamRoster.team_id = Player.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Player JOIN TeamRoster ON Player.team_id = TeamRoster.team_id WHERE player_position = 'Forward';
SELECT squad_name, player_name FROM SquadList JOIN Player ON SquadList.player_id = Player.player_id WHERE player_position = 'Defender';
SELECT * FROM team_rosters;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM team_rosters WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, age, position FROM player_list WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT match_id, match_date, venue FROM match_schedule ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM player_list JOIN match_participation ON player_list.player_id = match_participation.player_id WHERE match_participation.match_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM team_rosters;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM team_rosters WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, age, position FROM player_list WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT match_date, match_time, venue FROM match_schedule ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM player_list JOIN match_participation ON player_list.player_id = match_participation.player_id WHERE match_participation.match_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM players INNER JOIN teams ON players.team_id = teams.team_id;

SELECT player_name, position_name FROM players INNER JOIN player_positions ON players.player_id = player_positions.player_id INNER JOIN positions ON player_positions.position_id = positions.position_id;
SELECT squad_id, team_name, player_name FROM squad INNER JOIN teams ON squad.team_id = teams.team_id INNER JOIN players ON squad.player_id = players.player_id ORDER BY squad_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name FROM teams ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM players JOIN teams ON players.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT player_name, position_name FROM players JOIN player_positions ON players.player_id = player_positions.player_id JOIN positions ON player_positions.position_id = positions.position_id;

SELECT player_name, position_name FROM players JOIN player_positions ON players.player_id = player_positions.player_id JOIN positions ON player_positions.position_id = positions.position_id WHERE position_name = 'Forward';
